MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL29 postcode area of Colwyn Bay, affecting properties in Dolwen Road, Geulan Road, Bwlch Y Gwynt Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  4:55PM. In order to complete repairs, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties at 7:30PM and we expect the power to be restored by 10:30PM for these properties. All remaining customers we expect power to be restored by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:23PM on 3rd March 2021.
